snippet: AZ Alkmaar have appointed John van den Brom as their new coach, the former midfielder replacing Marco van Basten, who gave up the job because of health issues....

headline.print_headline: AZ Almaar Appoint Van Den Brom as New Coach
headline.main: AZ Almaar Appoint Van Den Brom as New Coach

lead_paragraph: AZ Alkmaar have appointed John van den Brom as their new coach, the former midfielder replacing Marco van Basten, who gave up the job because of health issues.
